headline: BofA Trimmed Lululemon Target to $370, Should Have Lowered the Buy Rating
summary: BofA Securities has lowered its price target on Lululemon (NASDAQ: LULU) from $400 to $370 while maintaining a Buy rating a couple of weeks ago. The revision followed updated guidance from the company, which kept its fiscal 2025 sales forecast intact but trimmed its earnings outlook by 2.5%. The new EPS range stands at $14.58 […]
